name: Lyra コトネ / Pokemon
description:
weight 0.6 ~ 0.7 is best.

I created this LoRA in response to a request.

Please read the description.

설명을 읽어주세요

outfit1 (normal)
ly01, overalls, white thighhighs, red bow, red shirt, white headwear, hat bow, eyelashes

outfit2 (sygna)
ly02, hair flower, blue flower, twintails, detached sleeves, green dress, bare shoulders, green skirt, eyelashes, hairband

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.

SYGNA outfits may be limited in some poses due to the lack of dataset images.
